New Records: The Thunder extended their largest victory margin of the season by winning 102-86.
Isaiah Joe made three consecutive three-pointers late in the game.
Key Match Events: The Thunder's offensive movement in the third quarter extended their lead.
The Magic struggled significantly from the field and three-point line.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder's young trio of Jalen Williams, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, and Chet Holmgren showed promise with their combined performance.
Others: The Magic were missing key players Paolo Banchero and Wendell Carter Jr., impacting their performance.
